articles.title: KPA Will Never Remain Passive Onlooker to Key Resolve and Foal Eagle: Spokesman for General Staff of KPA
articles.content:
KPA Will Never Remain Passive Onlooker to Key Resolve and Foal Eagle: Spokesman for General Staff of KPA
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army issued the following statement on Sunday:
					 The U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces kicked off adventurous Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises on March 2 despite strong protest and denunciation at home and abroad.
					
					 The three services of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces have already been deployed in south Korea and its vicinity for these war maneuvers and huge forces of the south Korean puppet army, war servants of their master U.S., are fully ready for them.
					
					 Involved there are the U.S. satellite forces including the UK, France, Australia and Canada.
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle which will last till April 24 are dangerous nuclear war drills for invading the DPRK as they are aimed at swiftly hurling  and forward-deploying the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in contingency on the Korean peninsula, mounting a surprise preemptive attack on it by "combined forces", "liquidating"   DPRK's headquarters and "occupying  Pyongyang".
					
					 The gravity of the situation lies in that these war exercises started in the wake of the recent undisguised declaration made by Obama, the chieftain of war of the U.S. imperialists, that it is the policy target of the USA to stamp out the ideology chosen by the DPRK and "bring down" its social system.
					
					 In a word, Key Resolve and Foal Eagle are an undisguised encroachment upon the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK and an unpardonable war hysteria of dishonest hostile forces.
					
					 In the final analysis, the above-said saber-rattling clearly proves that the claim of the U.S. imperialists and their followers that the war maneuvers are of "defensive nature" is crafty sophism to conceal their reckless preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK and their rhetoric about "annual drills" is nothing but a smokescreen to cover up their surprise invasion of the north.
					
					 The situation on the Korean peninsula is again inching close to the brink of a war.
					
					 In view of the prevailing situation the General Staff of the Korean People's Army clarifies the following principled stand internally and externally:
					
					1. Now that the dangerous war drills of the U.S. imperialists and their followers have been kicked off, our revolutionary armed forces will never remain a passive onlooker to this grave situation.
					
					The DPRK had already declared before the world that as the Obama group is becoming all the more desperate in its smear campaign against the DPRK, the group is ratcheting up its harsh sanctions and pressure on the DPRK and its war drills against the DPRK are gaining in scope and strength, pursuant to its outrageous hostile policy towards the DPRK, the DPRK will take toughest measures to cope with them.
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle go to prove that the U.S. extreme hostile policy towards the DPRK is being implemented through dangerous practical actions.
					
					 The Korean People's Army will never overlook the saber-rattling as its aggressive and offensive nature has been brought to light.
					
					 Our revolutionary armed forces never make an empty talk.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their allies should bear in mind that all the ground, sea, underwater, air and cyber striking means of our revolutionary armed forces always aim at their designated targets and are fully ready to strike them.
					
					2. They should clearly know that our revolutionary armed forces will never allow their slightest intrusion into the DPRK's territory, territorial air and waters.
					
					The DPRK had already declared internally and externally its firm determination that it would bring earlier the final ruin of the U.S. imperialists and their allies by conventional war of Korean style if they unleash a conventional war against it, through powerful nuclear strikes of Korean style if they ignite a nuclear war against it and by preeminent cyber war of Korean style if they attempt to "bring down" our country by cyber war.
					
					 Our powerful revolutionary Paektusan army has bolstered up its weaponry to take revenge upon them for the last several decades to put its pledge into practice.
					
					 Those drills are the most undisguised infringement upon the DPRK's sovereignty and dignity and a grave military provocation to it for which they can never excuse.
					
					 It is the consistent stand of our revolutionary armed forces that in case even a single shell drops on any place over which the sovereignty of the DPRK is exercised, it will promptly take counteractions.
					
					 3. The U.S. imperialists and their allies should clearly know that their outrageous and vicious aggressive actions being staged under the signboard of peace will never work on the DPRK in this bright world.
					
					 It is the U.S. that claims Key Resolve and Foal Eagle are aimed to "conquer" the capital city of the sovereign state and "liquidate" its headquarters but insists that they are "defensive and "annual" ones. It is a robber-like logic.
					
					 The U.S. scenario is to make a unipolar world dominated by the USA and where U.S.-style democracy and market economy hold sway. 
					
					 The evermore undisguised military moves of the U.S. imperialists on the Korean peninsula and in its vicinity such as Key Resolve and Foal Eagle are not targeted on the DPRK only.
					
					 It is the real intention of the U.S. expanded hostile policy toward the DPRK to lay a vast siege to  the continent and let Far East and the Asian continent allow the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices.
					
					 The U.S. is seriously mistaken if it thinks such moves will work on the Korean peninsula and the rest of this bright world.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will further bolster up weapons to annihilate the enemies, as the U.S. imperialists become evermore ferocious in their aggressive nature, the south Korean puppet forces escalate confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north to prolong their remaining days and dishonest hostile forces blindly follow them. 
					
					 The only means to cope with the aggression and war by the U.S. imperialists and their followers is neither dialogue nor peace. They should be dealt with only by merciless strikes.
					
					 The DPRK's revolutionary armed forces will watch with a high degree of combat alertness the dangerous saber-rattling of the U.S imperialists and their followers.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggressors, the south Korean puppet forces and their followers will have to bitterly regret the irretrievable consequences to be entailed by Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.

articles.title: FM Spokesman Denounces U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
FM Spokesman Denounces U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK released the following statement Monday in connection with the fact that the U.S. started with the south Korean puppet forces Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises, war exercises for invading the DPRK, despite its repeated warnings:
					 The drills to be staged across south Korea from March 2 to April 24 are said to involve huge U.S. forces in south Korea, the U.S. mainland, Japan and other overseas bases, south Korean puppet forces and massive war means including a U.S. coastal warship that was manufactured to suit the seabed features off the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The exercises are intolerable aggression moves pursuant to the U.S. Korea strategy designed to "bring down" the socialist system chosen by the Korean people.
					
					 By putting sustained military pressure on the DPRK the U.S. seeks to prevent it from concentrating efforts on economic construction and the improvement of the people's living standard, and by describing those exercises as "annual and defensive ones", it seeks to make the DPRK accustomed and get used to its war exercises and grow lax and then invade the DPRK in the end.
					
					 The U.S. launch of the joint military exercises on the Korean peninsula in defiance of the unanimous protest and denunciation by people around it is prompted by a sinister trick pursuant to its pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy.
					
					 Through the continued joint military exercises the U.S. intends to keep the south Korean puppet forces, its servants, close to it, stem the north-south relations from advancing and use the puppet forces as cannon fodder for besieging and containing surrounding countries.
					
					 At the same time, the U.S. also seeks to keep the situation on the peninsula tense and maintain the pretext for arms buildup in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The joint military exercises this year have more provocative nature than ever before.
					
					 The DPRK set forth bold and flexible proposals to remove the danger of war, defuse tension and create a peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula this year and has made sincere efforts for their realization.
					
					 It clarified that in case the U.S. stops for the time being joint military exercises in and around south Korea, we have the willingness to respond to it with a moratorium on a nuclear test which the U.S. is much concerned about, and expressed the stand that we are always ready to sit with the U.S. at a negotiating table.
					
					 But from the outset of the year the U.S. president personally declared "additional sanctions" against the DPRK and blustered that it will "bring down" the socialist system which the Korean people regard dearer than their own lives, and started the aggression war exercises with the south Korean puppet forces against the DPRK, thereby blatantly challenging the sincere proposals and efforts made by the DPRK.
					
					 This has only brought to light the nature of the U.S. as the chief culprit escalating tension and harassing peace and the deceptive nature of its hypocritical talk about dialogue.
					
					 The exercises have especially high possibility of causing a spark, given the grim situation and atmosphere caused by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces' provocative anti-DPRK confrontational frenzy.
					
					 Now that the U.S. has become all the more pronounced in its hostile policy toward the DPRK, bereft of reason, the army and people of the DPRK will take tougher counteraction of justice.
					
					 As already declared, they are fully ready for any form of war which the U.S. wants and may opt and are full of the firm will to counter the enemies' slightest provocation with the just great war for national reunification.
					
					 In case a war breaks out on the Korean peninsula at last, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces can never evade consequences and responsibilities.

articles.title: Congratulations to President of Algeria
articles.content:
Congratulations to President of Algeria
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a congratulatory message to Abdelaziz Bouteflika, president of Algeria, on his birthday.
					 The message expressed belief that good relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger and wished the president good health and happiness and greater success in his work for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Qatar Personages
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Qatar Personages
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received gifts from the general directors of Marasi Trade and Transport Corporation and the Woodland International Trade Corporation of Qatar. 
					 The gifts were handed over to officials concerned of the DPRK working in Qatar by the general directors on Feb. 15 and 22.

articles.title: Spring Tree Planting Starts in DPRK
articles.content:
Spring Tree Planting Starts in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Spring tree planting has started in the DPRK on Monday, Tree Planting Day, the significant day when President Kim Il Sung kindled the first torch for the movement for planting trees.
					Officials and other working people and youth and students here held meetings and turned out in the tree planting. 
					
					Present at the meetings were Choe Ryong Hae, Choe Thae Bok, Kang Sok Ju, Kim Phyong Hae, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of ministries and national institutions and those of the party and power bodies and working people's organizations and members of the youth league, the union of agricultural workers and the women's union and other people in the city.
					
					Reporters and speakers recalled that President Kim Il Sung climbed Moran Hill on March 2, Juche 35 (1946) and kindled the first torch for the movement for planting.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul to turn the country into a thick woodland and greenery though he was busy providing his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					They said the noble wishes of and Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for turning all the mountains of the country into green woods are being successfully implemented thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un, another peerless patriot. 
					
					They stressed the need for all people to turn out as one in the campaign for turning the country associated with the life of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il into a socialist paradise. 
					
					Officials, other working people and youth and students planted trees of various species at the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Site, on Moran Hill, Mt. Ryongak and around the Central Tree Nursery of the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection.
					
					Meanwhile, officials of the Capital City Construction Commission, Ministry of Railways, Ministry of Culture, Ministry of Land and Environment Protection, Ministry of Urban Management and the General Bureau of Pleasure Park planted trees in the Arboretum of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, Sports Village on Yanggak Islet, Korean Film Studio, Pyongyang International Airport and other places on the same day. 
					
					Officials of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, the Pyongyang City People's Committee and party and power bodies and working people's organizations in the city planted thousands of trees of at least 20 species including fruit trees at the Jangchon Vegetable Cooperative Farm in Sadong District. 
					
					Working people in all provinces held meetings and planted trees of good species.
					
					More than 4.8 million trees and flower shrubs were planted on the day across the country.

articles.title: ASEAN Committee in DPRK Gives Reception on Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
ASEAN Committee in DPRK Gives Reception on Day of Shining Star 
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The ASEAN Committee in the DPRK Monday gave a reception to honor the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star). 
					 Present there on invitation were Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director, and other officials of the WPK Central Committee. 
					
					 Present there were Op Sisawada, Cambodian ambassador to the DPRK who is chairman of the ASEAN Committee in the DPRK; Kiettisak Keobanhdith, Lao ambassador; Pham Viet Hung, Vietnamese ambassador; and Ilham Tuah Bin Illias, Malaysian charge d' affaires ad interim. 
					
					 Op Sisawada said in his speech that the great Generalissimo HE Kim Jong Il developed the DPRK into an invincible political, ideological and military power which stands dignified thanks to independence and strong thanks to Songun politics. 
					
					 He paid highest tribute to Kim Jong Il, eternal image of the great Paektusan nation. 
					
					 Kang Sok Ju said in his speech that Kim Jong Il who performed undying exploits on behalf of the country and its people, the times and history would always be remembered by the Korean people and the world progressives. 
					
					 The DPRK will as ever make positive efforts to boost the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation with ASEAN countries, Kang added.

articles.title: Senior Officials in Charge of Administrative Affairs Visit Kim Jong Il's Birthplace
articles.content:
Senior Officials in Charge of Administrative Affairs Visit Kim Jong Il's Birthplace 
						
 Samjiyon, March 2 (KCNA) -- Senior officials in charge of administrative affairs across the country started their study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu. They visited leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp on Monday. 
					 They laid bouquets before the mosaic portraying the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and paid tribute to them. 
					
					 They went round the secret camp in Mt. Paektu after being briefed on the monument inscribed with the poem "Shining Star" written by President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the birthday of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 They went round the simple log cabin in which he grew up to be a great revolutionary, hearing snowstorm in the Paektu forest and gunfire during the great anti-Japanese war as a lullaby. 
					
					 They visited the log cabin which hosted the headquarters where they deeply grasped the immortal revolutionary exploits the President performed by leading the Korean revolution to shining victory.
					
					 They also looked round the shallow well used by anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk and trees bearing revolutionary slogans written by her.
					
					 They toured the Chongbong bivouac, Konchang bivouac and Sajabong secret camp used by soldiers of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) during the days of advance into the homeland led by the President. 
					
					 At the Chongbong bivouac they laid bouquets before the statue of the President and paid tribute to him. 
					
					 They went round the log cabin used by the headquarters and printing house in the Sajabong secret camp, the site of the room for soldiers of the KPRA, the site of campfire and trees bearing slogans. 
					
					 They held a meeting for hearing the recital of long epic "Mt. Paektu" and a contest of singing revolutionary songs in chorus on the same day.

articles.title: Learning from Spirit of Ri In Mo, Pro-reunification Patriotic Fighter, Encouraged in DPRK
articles.content:
Learning from Spirit of Ri In Mo, Pro-reunification Patriotic Fighter, Encouraged in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Ri In Mo, a pro-reunification patriotic fighter and former unconverted long-term prisoner, is regarded as an incarnation of faith and will in the DPRK.
					 Ri was arrested by the enemy while fighting as a guerilla in Mt. Jiri during the 1950-1953 Korean war, before serving 34 year-long prison term.
					
					 In praise of his indomitable spirit, the DPRK government erected his bust in Thongil Street of Pyongyang.
					
					 In this regard, Jong Hak Chol, a worker of the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, told KCNA:
					
					 Ri In Mo, a former war correspondent of the Korean People's Army, glorified the honor of being a member of the Workers' Party of Korea, not lured to all sorts of temptations and not yielded to bestial tortures in his prison life.
					
					 His revolutionary faith and will are the example to be followed by younger generation.
					
					 Kim Myong Ju, a student of Kim Hyong Jik University of Education, said that Ri In Mo's bust makes her harden her determination to firmly defend the ideology and system of the DPRK.
					
					 Ri Kwang Chol, vice-chairman of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said:
					
					 Now the DPRK's young people are working hard to learn from the mental world of Ri In Mo, who lived a life with steadfast will and faith.
					
					 Various forms of meetings, themed "Ri In Mo and I", are now taking place among youth league organizations in the city.
					
					 Ri In Mo's works including songs "Thought of Love", "Ode to Faith and Will" and "Led by You, We Will Win" dedicated to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and his reminiscence "Faith and My Life" are getting popular among young people as the days go by.
					
					 The reminiscence tells about the whole life of Ri In Mo, an awardee of the title of DPRK Hero twice and the National Reunification Prize.

articles.title: Railway Service for Visit to Sinchon Museum Begins
articles.content:
Railway Service for Visit to Sinchon Museum Begins
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- A regular railway service for visit to the Sinchon Museum, a witness to the massacre committed by the U.S. imperialists during the Koran War (1950-1953), began in the DPRK.
					 The passenger train runs once in two days between Phyongsong, South Phyongan Province and Sinchon County, South Hwanghae Province.

articles.title: Saplings Required for Forest Restoration This Year Secured
articles.content:
Saplings Required for Forest Restoration This Year Secured
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Hundreds of millions of saplings required for forest restoration this year have been secured in the DPRK.
					 Saplings of different species including Larix lepolepis, fir and pine-nut tree required for creating forests in the period of spring tree planting are sufficiently prepared.
					
					 The Central Tree Nursery of the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection raised tens of millions of saplings by fully displaying the vitality of the foundation of scientific, industrial and intensive production of saplings. 
					
					 A new method of tree planting made it possible to raise the rate of rooting of planted saplings and plant them irrespective of seasons.
					
					 Lots of saplings were raised at tree nurseries of the forest management stations to create forests in each city and county.
					
					 Millions of saplings were raised by nurseries of the forest management stations in Sunchon and Tokchon cities through strict measures for protecting them from damage by insects. 
					
					 Similar successes were reported from nurseries of the forest management stations in Jonchon, Songwon, Jongphyong and Paekam counties.

articles.title: Tok Islets Are Part of Inviolable Territory of Korea: DPRK Scholar
articles.content:
Tok Islets Are Part of Inviolable Territory of Korea: DPRK Scholar
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Japan has now become evermore desperate in its moves for seizing Tok Islets, which are part of the inviolable territory of Korea.
					 From the beginning of this year, Japan posted on Internet a picture book drawn by a former teacher of a primary school in Shimane Prefecture, which tells schoolchildren the Tok Islets are "inalienable territory" of Japan. It also works hard to distribute to world's biggest cities a video asserting Japan's "dominium" over Tok Islets in 11 languages.
					
					 Japanese Foreign Minister Kishida in a speech at the Diet openly insisted upon Japan's "claim" to Tok Islets.
					
					 The Japanese government dispatched a vice minister to an event held in Shimane Prefecture some days ago to mark the "Takeshima (Tok Islets) day". 
					
					 In this regard, KCNA met Dr. and Associate Prof. Hwang Myong Chol, a section chief of the History Institute of the Academy of Social Sciences of the DPRK. 
					
					 He said:
					
					 According to history books, Tok Islets were belonged to Usan Kingdom from 6th century ago and later, Usan Kingdom reverted to Silla Kingdom (early in the 6th century-935). 
					
					 In particular, the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910) promulgated the Ordinance No. 41 in October 1900 with an aim to reconfirm its dominium over the islets.
					
					 It was none other than Korea, which found the islets for the first time, incorporated them into its territory and proclaimed its dominium at home and abroad in keeping with modern international laws.
					
					 Historical data proving that Tok Islets are part of inviolable territory of Korea have been discovered one after another. Even old documents of Japan, found at a history archive in Shimane Prefecture a few years ago, say that in the 19th century some Japanese fishermen were executed for landing on Tok Islets in disregard of "Ordinance Banning Sailing to the Islets".
					
					 Ordinances of Japan instituted in 1950s stipulated that Tok Islets are not belonged to Japan.
					
					 The international community acknowledges that the islets are part of inviolable territory of Korea.
					
					 Lurking behind Japan's persistent claim to the islets is an ulterior intention to reduce the islets into those in dispute by internationalizing and politicizing the issue of the islets and thus make a comeback to Korea under this pretext and, furthermore, realize its old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" with the Korean Peninsula as a springboard. 
					
					 Tok Islets are part of the sacred territory of Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Conducting Spring Tree Planting
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Conducting Spring Tree Planting
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Papers Monday dedicate editorials to the Tree-planting Day, the significant day when President Kim Il Sung kindled the first torch for the movement for planting trees.
					 The President climbed Moran Hill on March 2, Juche 35 (1946). Watching the mountain and river of the country damaged during the Japanese imperialist colonial rule, he unrolled a far-reaching plan to turn all the mountains into thickly wooded people's resorts by planting lots of trees. 
					
					 To turn all mountains into golden and treasure ones is the behests of the President and leader Kim Jong Il and their lifetime desires, says Rodong Sinmun. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Only when lots of trees are planted and cultivated is it possible to protect the land and turn the mountains and fields of the country into a socialist fairyland.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un said that we can no longer step back with the issue of bare mountains left unsettled. He instructed the entire party, the whole country and all the people to turn out in the campaign to restore forests, regarding it as a war with nature, just as the whole country turned out to clear debris in the period of the postwar rehabilitation and construction.
					
					 This reflects the noble aspiration of Kim Jong Un to turn our country into a more beautiful one and glorify it for eternity.
					
					 Our generation is faced with a sacred duty to turn the great country into a socialist paradise.
					
					 Now is the time for the entire party, the whole army and all the people to turn out as one in the forest restoration campaign, regarding the tree planting as an important work related to the destiny of the future of the country and the nation and final victory in the drive for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The forest restoration campaign serve as a yardstick judging patriotism of people.
					
					 Whoever plants and cultivates even a single more tree is a true patriot. 
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all Koreans to conduct a dynamic forest restoration campaign to turn all mountains of the country into the golden and treasure ones and thus make positive contributions to turning our country into the golden tapestry in the era of the Workers' Party and into thickly wooded people's resorts.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Settling Accounts with U.S. through Military Reactions
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Settling Accounts with U.S. through Military Reactions
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Obama malignantly termed the DPRK the "most isolated, most sanctioned and most cut-off dictatorial state on earth" after proclaiming new "additional sanctions" against it through presidential executive order from the outset of the year.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article says there is no need to explain which is the most cut-off dictatorial state on earth.
					
					 The U.S. outrageous and heinous state-sponsored politically-motivated terrorism against the DPRK is pursuant to its deep-rooted policy for stifling the DPRK, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 After defining the DPRK as the enemy the U.S. has never recognized its sovereignty but escalated the hostile acts to bring down its social system. Much earlier than the spawning of the nuclear issue, institutional and legal mechanisms were set up against the DPRK and scenarios for military attacks and nuclear threats were undisguisedly worked out to bring down its ideology and social system. 
					
					 The U.S. has run the whole gamut of base plots to destroy the DPRK, while talking it has no "hostile intent." This year the U.S. let loose a spate of invectives against the DPRK and set it a policy to bring down its social system, going busy with war maneuvers. This proves that the U.S. hostile acts against the DPRK have reached an extreme phase.
					
					 Now that the U.S. imperialists try to stamp out the ideology of the DPRK and "bring down" its social system through provocative saber-rattling, the DPRK neither feels any need to sit at a negotiating table with them nor has any willingness to deal with them. It is necessary to settle accounts with those kicking up war hysteria while openly crying out for "collapse" of the DPRK only through resolute military reactions. This is the determination of the army and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Minju Joson Discloses U.S. Ultimate Purpose in Spreading "Theory of N. Korea's Hacking" on Its Company
articles.content:
Minju Joson Discloses U.S. Ultimate Purpose in Spreading "Theory of N. Korea's Hacking" on Its Company
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Recently, the director of the U.S. National Security Agency (NSA) slandered the DPRK as the seat of hacking attack on the Sony Pictures Entertainment while President Obama issued an executive order to the effect that relevant information should be shared among domestic companies and between companies and the government under the pretext of coping with the "threat to cyber security" by the DPRK.
					 Minju Joson Monday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Such behavior of the U.S. is reminding one of the trite methods it has used whenever it seeks sinister political purposes.
					
					 It is the true intention of the U.S. to mount a "retaliatory" cyber terrorist attack on the DPRK by terming it a cyber criminal, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 There is another reason why the U.S. is working hard to label the DPRK as a criminal while describing itself as a victim with the cyber attack case as a momentum. The U.S. face has now been seriously marred in the international community following the disclosure of close linkage between the "most developed hacking group in history" and the NSA. The experts of the Russian Kasperski Laboratory disclosed that the hacking group developed vicious code undetectable by anti-virus software, i.e. high-tech spy program, to hack and thieve secrets from 30 countries. Finding it hard to escape the protest and denunciation by the international community, the U.S. painted itself as a "victim of cyber attack."
					
					 The U.S. needed absurd "theory of north Korea's hacking", not objective fact about the case of hacking attack on the Sony Pictures Entertainment.
					
					 The U.S. trick and plot will only bring its sinister colors into bolder relief before the world.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slams U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces' Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slams U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces' Joint Military Drills
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces finally kicked off large-scale Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills despite strong protest and denunciation at home and abroad. 
					 The sky, land and seas of south Korea have turned into theaters of war drills.
					
					 Minju Joson Monday in a commentary terms this a blatant challenge and mockery of the aspiration and desire of all the Koreans for peace on the Korean peninsula and improved north-south relations.
					
					 Whenever joint saber-rattling was staged, the situation on the peninsula inched close to the brink of a war, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 That was why all Koreans and other peace-loving people of the world strongly demanded the U.S. imperialists and the puppet warmongers stop the joint military drills.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that they are staging Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint drills against the north while openly spreading the story about "collapse of the north".
					
					 These days high-ranking politicians of the U.S. never open their mouth without letting loose a spate of rigmaroles about "the collapse of the north".
					
					  The south Korean puppet group is echoing its U.S. master's utterances.
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle are now being staged against this backdrop. This goes to prove that "dialogue" and "improved relations" touted by the puppet group is nothing but hypocrisy.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the puppet group are sadly mistaken if they calculate they can stifle the DPRK by force.
					
					 Explicitly speaking once again, they have been placed within the sight of the arms of Paektusan.
					
					 They would be well advised to stop going reckless, mindful of this.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flails S. Korean Puppet Forces for Talking about "Dialogue"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flails S. Korean Puppet Forces for Talking about "Dialogue"
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the south Korean Ministry of Unification recently talked rubbish that the north should not take issue with Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises as they are "annual and defensive ones" but "respond to the south side's proposal for dialogue at an early date". A spokesman for the puppet Ministry of Defense blustered that the saber-rattling would be staged as planned, insisting that it "is unreasonable" for the north to link Key Resolve and Foal Eagle with the inter-Korean relations.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are talking about "dialogue" while staging the largest-ever war maneuvers against the DPRK in league of foreign forces. This is an act of deceiving and mocking at the whole nation and the public opinion at home and abroad.
					
					 To ease tension and create a peaceful climate on the Korean peninsula is an essential requirement for mending the inter-Korean relations and, at the same time, a touchstone distinguishing the stand and attitude of the south Korean authorities toward dialogue and inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Their talk about "dialogue" is nothing but sophism to evade the blame for the inter-Korean relations deteriorated due to their criminal sycophancy toward the U.S. and their moves for escalating confrontation with the DPRK and justify their moves for invading it at any cost.
					
					 However, it is foolish to mislead public opinion with such poor rhetoric.
					
					 The frantic saber-rattling being staged under the signboard of "dialogue" brings to light the sinister intention of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet warmongers to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula at any cost.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces should bear in mind that if they persist in the reckless north-targeted war moves, they will not escape a stern judgment.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Terrorist Action against Progressive Paper
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Terrorist Action against Progressive Paper
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet Supreme Court forcibly shut down Jaju Minbo, a progressive internet paper, on groundless charges that it is a "medium following and sympathizing with the assertion of the north and benefiting the enemy".
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary that this action brought to light the true colors of the puppet authorities as a group of traitors to the nation and the fascist junta opposed to the compatriots and the country's reunification.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Jaju Minbo is the patriotic paper which has steered the struggle for social progress, reunification and patriotism, setting it as its righteous objective to "establish proper national spirit and aspire after reunification" over the past 15 years since its foundation.
					
					 The paper has only called for justice and truth, reunification and patriotism on behalf of the public mind-set.
					
					 Just and praiseworthy were its activities as it took the lead in asserting the nation's unity and reunification and disclosing and censuring confrontational actions against reunification.
					
					 We cannot but take a serious note of the fact that the forcible closing of Jaju Minbo is part of the sinister intention of the conservative ruling forces to prolong their dictatorial rule.
					
					 The puppet authorities are making desperate efforts to tide over their evermore deepening ruling crisis by suppressing progressive forces active for improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving the independent reunification against the dictatorial rule, including the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Teachers Union and the Unified Progressive Party.
					
					 The action taken to forcibly ban Jaju Minbo is part of this desperate campaign.
					
					 They committed a mediaeval brutal act of forcibly shutting down the legitimate paper for the mere reason that it advocated truth in the 21st century. This is shame on human civilization.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces, the world's worst human rights abusers and ferocious destroyers of civilization, had better stop talking about inviolable human rights.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korean Joint Military Exercises Denounced by S. Korean Organization
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korean Joint Military Exercises Denounced by S. Korean Organization
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held the 154th meeting for peace and disarmament in front of the building of the puppet Ministry of Defence in Seoul on February 27, in which they denounced the south Korea-U.S. joint military exercises chilling the atmosphere for mending the inter-Korean relations.
					 It said the saber-rattling is aimed to develop the "tailored deterrence strategy" known as a strategy for a preemptive attack at the DPRK into a new offensive operational plan.
					
					 The danger of a nuclear war will increase on the Korean peninsula as the drills for cyber and psychological warfare targeting the "collapse of the north" will be intensified more than ever, it noted, adding:
					
					 The south Korean and the U.S. authorities described their exercises as "defensive". But they are to mount a preemptive attack upon the DPRK.
					
					 The organization stressed that the Ministry of Defence should put an end to the vicious cycle of confrontation on the Korean peninsula by immediately stopping the offensive and aggressive military exercises, and opt for building confidence.

articles.title: Struggle for Denouncing Park Geun Hye's Regime Intensified in S. Korea
articles.content:
Struggle for Denouncing Park Geun Hye's Regime Intensified in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- An all-people rally for denouncing the Park Geun Hye's regime for deteriorating people's living, violating democracy and threatening peace took place at the plaza of Seoul Railway Station in south Korea on February 28, according to Voice of People, a south Korean internet paper.
					 Present there were at least 5 000 people of various circles across south Korea.
					
					 At the rally Rev. Ham Se Ung, Pak Rae Gun, co-chairman of the All-People Measure Council for Sewol Disaster, and other speakers said that the "president" who was elected by an illegal way should be impeached, adding that the incompetent regime deceiving the people with lies should be punished surely.
					
					 A resolution was read out there.
					
					 At the end of rally its participants headed for Seoul Square, scattering leaflets condemning the Park Geun Hye group's fascist rule and calling on all to turn out in the action to force the dictatorship regime to resign.

articles.title: Foot-and-Mouth Disease Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
Foot-and-Mouth Disease Spreads in S. Korea 
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Damage by foot-and-mouth disease is increasing, according to the south Korean KBS and MBC. 
					 The foot-and-mouth disease occurred at a pig farm in Ponghwa County, North Kyongsang Province on February 24, leaving a lot of pigs buried. 
					
					 Hundreds of pigs were culled due to the spread of an epidemic on a farm in Sejong City.

articles.title: Seminars Held in Brazil, Pakistan, Malaysia
articles.content:
Seminars Held in Brazil, Pakistan, Malaysia
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- A seminar on leader Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea" was held in Brazil, and seminars on his feats in Pakistan and Malaysia between Feb. 6 and 16 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The chairman of the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea and other speakers at a seminar mentioned the gist of the work and praised the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu for successfully applying the Juche idea in the revolution and construction.
					
					 The rector and the vice-rector of a university in Pakistan said that they pay highest respects to Kim Jong Il who developed in depth the Juche idea so as to greatly contribute to the accomplishment of the cause of human independence and added that he is alive in the hearts of the Korean people, greatly encouraging them.
					
					 The secretary general of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan praised Kim Jong Il as a peerless patriot who was born at the secret camp in Mt. Paektu and devoted himself to the cause for the prosperity of the nation with his warm dedication to the people.
					
					 The director of a Malaysian company said that the Korean people are keeping to their road with dignity and firm belief and added that the feats Kim Jong Il performed by building the DPRK into an independent power are great, indeed.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Pakistan.

articles.title: Meeting for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Benin
articles.content:
Meeting for Solidarity with Korean People Held in Benin
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- A meeting for solidarity with the Korean people took place in Cotonou on Feb. 21.
					 It was attended by personages of Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader", Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and the Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin and citizens.
					
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, condemned the tortures committed by the CIA systematically in a premeditated way with the approval of the U.S. president and under his patronage.
					
					 He referred to the crimes of GIs in south Korea during and after the Korean War and said that it is the U.S. that should be in the dock.
					
					 Pascal Zouncheme, chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism who is rector of the Cotonou Institute of Journalism of Benin, said that the U.S. made no scruple of overthrowing the governments of progressive countries and committing acts of terrorism against politicians and the assassination of them under the pretext of "protecting human rights", and added that the overthrow of governments of Latin-American countries and all sorts of terrorist acts there were committed by the U.S.
					
					 All the wars unleashed by the U.S. under the pretext of the "protection of human rights" were bloody wars to conquer other countries, he said, adding that the U.S. is committing military interference in internal affairs of independent countries and slaughtering those peoples behind the curtain of the "protection of human rights".
					
					 At the end of the meeting the participants in the meeting watched a Korean film "Provoker of the Korean War".

articles.title: Obama Ridiculed in Nigeria
articles.content:
Obama Ridiculed in Nigeria
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website on Feb. 15 an article titled "Obama, mind your own business!"
					 Demos have continued in the U.S. in protest against racial discrimination since a white police officer's killing of a young black man in Ferguson City, Missouri State in August last year, the article said, adding:
					
					 This case hit hard the U.S. vociferous call for the "human rights" of other countries.
					
					 The black people in the U.S. have waged a strenuous struggle for their human rights for a long period but they have not yet been freed from the yoke of slavery.
					
					 What stunned the world was the attitude on the part of the U.S. judicial authorities.
					
					 The judicial authorities in Missouri State declared the slain young black man guilty while declaring the murderer police officer not guilty.
					
					 Angered by this, citizens staged demonstrations in many cities, including New York, Washington, Los Angels, Huston and Seattle.
					
					 President Obama branded those demos as crimes and insulted the demonstrators, saying that violence is unpardonable.
					
					 Great irony is that Obama is also a black man.
					
					 He who is proud of being the first black president in the history of America should not forget that he is also a black man.
					
					 In the American society today in which whites' killing of black people is being committed openly, no one can vouch that Obama can be an exception.
					
					 He would be well advised to deal with the serious human rights issues in his country before pulling up other countries over their "human rights".
					
					 He had better care for his own life, to begin with.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Foreign Papers
						
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried articles on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Bangladeshi paper Industry said in an article "The Feats Performed for the Socialist Cause" on Feb. 7:
					
					 Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il performed undying feats for the socialist cause.
					
					 The greatest of them is that he protected the destiny of socialism.
					
					 An important one is that he ushered in a new era of a great adance of the socialist cause.
					
					 The Egyptian paper AlMisaiya on Feb. 3 said in an article "Life for the Future":
					
					 Kim Jong Il devoted all his life to achieving the prosperity of Korea.
					
					 "For the future!" represented his patriotic spirit that ran through his whole life.
					
					 Not only the Korean people but also other progressives of the world will always keep deep in their hearts the great image of Kim Jong Il who devoted himself to the work for the country and its people.
					
					 A Senegalese paper, too, carried an article praising his life dedicated to the future on Feb. 11.

articles.title: Portavoz del Estado Mayor General de EPC advierte a EE.UU. y sus satellites
articles.content:
Portavoz del Estado Mayor General de EPC advierte a EE.UU. y sus satelites
						
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea publico el dia primero la siguiente declaracion:
					En contra de la fuerte demanda y condena del interior y exterior del pais, los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus titeres surcoreanos volveran a realizar desde el 2 de marzo los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle".
					
					Los planeados colectivos de operacion de las tropas terrestres, maritimas y aereas de EE.UU. ya se han ubicado en el suelo surcoreano y su contorno y un numero elevado de sus tropas titeres surcoreanas han entrado en el  perfecto estado de combate.
					
					Se suman a esta locura hasta los uniformados de los paises satelites inclusive Gran Bretana, Francia, Australia y Canada.
					
					"Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle" que se efectuaran hasta el 24 de abril son los  ejercicios muy peligrosos para la guerra nuclear  que persiguen la introduccion y el despliegue rapidos de las tropas norteamericanas en el tiempo de emergencia de la Peninsula Coreana, el ataque preventivo e inesperado por las "fuerzas aliadas", la "eliminacion" de nuestra direccion y la "ocupacion de Pyongyang".
					
					La gravedad de la situacion consiste en que este simulacro se perpetra despues de que Obama dijera que castrar nuestra idea y "derrumbar" nuestro regimen son la meta politica de Estados Unidos.
					
					En una palabra, los presentes ejercicios son la provocacion imperdonable de las malsanas fuerzas hostiles encaminada a atentar abiertamente contra nuestra soberania y dignidad.
					
					 EE.UU. y sus fuerzas seguidoras los califican de "anuales y defensivos" a fin de ocultar su intencion de ataque preventivo nuclear a la RPDC y  una cortina para ocultar el caracter sorpresivo de la agresion a esta.
					
					En la Peninsula Coreana corre otra vez el riesgo de guerra inminente.
					
					Frente a esta situacion dada, el Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea expone al interior y exterior la siguiente posicion de principios:
					
					1. Ya que comenzo de hecho el peligroso entrenamiento de guerra anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y sus satelites, nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias no estaran con brazos cruzados ante esta situacion grave.
					
					Dado que se pone mas cruel la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU., ya hemos proclamado que cuanto mas se eleve el grado de calumnias de la banda de Obama, se recrudezcan la sancion y la presion y se amplien la dimension y esfera de los simulacros, tanto mas superduras seran las contramedidas que tomaremos.
					
					Los presentes ejercicios demuestran que la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. se extiende otra vez a las peligrosas acciones de combate real.
					
					Nuestro ejercito no estara con brazos cruzados  una vez que se ha revelado el caracter agresivo y ofensivo de este entrenamiento.
					
					Nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias no dicen palabras hueras.
					
					Los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus fuerzas seguidores deben tener bien presente que todos los medios de golpe de nuestras fuerzas terrestres, maritimas, submarinas, aereas y ciberneticas estan apuntando siempre los blancos asignados manteniendose en el estado a punto de disparar.
					
					2. Deben conocer bien que nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias no perdonan nunca ni la menor forma de incursion de EE.UU. y sus satelites en nuestro territorio, espacio aereo y aguas jurisdiccionales.
					
					Ya hemos declarado que hemos tomado la decision de adelantar la caida final de EE.UU. con la guerra convencional, el ataque nuclear y la guerra cibernetica por nuestro estilo si el imperio impone la guerra de agresion con las fuerzas convencionales o con las fuerzas nucleares e intenta "derrumbarnos" con la guerra cibernetica.
					
					Para poner en practica esa decision, nuestro poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu vino preparando de siglo en siglo los fusiles de venganza.
					
					 "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle" son la violacion mas abierta e injustificable sobre nuestra soberania y dignidad y la grave provocacion militar.
					
					Pasaremos a la contraofensiva en el acto si los enemigos cometen la provocacion de enviar una sola bala hacia cualquier lugar bajo nuestra soberania, esto es la posicion inconmovible de nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias.
					
					3. EE.UU. y sus seguidores deben tener en cuenta que no se aceptaran nunca en este mundo claro sus brutales maniobras de agresion que se perpetran bajo el vistoso cartel de paz.
					
					Es precisamente EE.UU. el gangster que describe como "defensivos" y "anuales" los ejercicios "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle" que se proponen "conquistar" la capital del Estado soberano y "eliminar" su direccion.
					
					Someter el mundo al control de los Estados Unidos de America y convertirlo como el unipolarizado donde reinen la democracia al estilo norteamericano y la economia de mercado, esto es la siniestra intencion del imperio.
					
					La RPDC no es el unico blanco de "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle" y otras agravantes maniobras militares de EE.UU. en la Peninsula Coreana y sus alrededores.
					
					Su ampliada politica hostil anti-RPDC persigue formar el extenso cerco sobre el continente asiatico y convertirlo en una region donde se toleren la arbitrariedad y despotismo de EE.UU.
					
					No habra el acto mas estupido si piensan que sus maniobras resultaran efectivas en la Peninsula Coreana y el mundo claro de hoy.
					
					Nuestro ejercito revolucionario tomara con mas firmeza el fusil para aniquilar a los enemigos, mientras se tornen mas brutales la naturaleza agresiva de los imperialistas norteamericanos y la campana de confrontacion fratricida de los titeres surcoreanos y se haga mas grave la obediencia de las fuerzas hostiles malsanas.
					
					El unico medio para controlar el imperialismo norteamericano y sus satelites que se dedican a la agresion y la guerra no es el dialogo ni la paz sino el ataque implacable.
					
					Nuestro ejercito revolucionario observara atentamente en el estado de alerta las peligrosas e imprudentes maniobras de guerra de EE.UU. y sus seguidores.
					
					Los agresores norteamericanos, los titeres surcoreanos y las fuerzas seguidoras se remorderan y se lamentaran por las consecuencias irrecuperables de "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle".

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX condena ejercicios militares EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX condena ejercicios militares EE.UU.-Sur de Corea
						
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con motivo de que EE.UU. iniciaron con los titeres surcoreanos los ejercicios de guerra de agresion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Key Resolve y Foal Eagle, desoyendo la reiterada advertencia, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC publico el dia 2 la siguiente declaracion:
					  Tendran lugar del 2 de marzo al 24 de abril en toda la extension surcoreana los ejercicios militares conjuntos Key Resolve y Foal Eagle.
					
					  Segun trascendidos, participaran en esas maniobras muchas tropas norteamericanas estacionadas en el Sur de Corea, el territorio estadounidense, Japon y otras bases militares en el extranjero, los efectivos del ejercito titere surcoreano y enormes medios de guerra, inclusive el buque de guerra norteamericano construido acorde a la topografia submarina de la zona periferica de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  La repeticion de los ejercicios militares parte de la estrategia sobre Corea cuyo objetivo esta en "derrumbar" el regimen socialista optado por nuestro pueblo.
					
					  Al mantener la presion militar sobre nuestro pais, EE.UU. intenta impedir que nos concentremos en la construccion economica y el mejoramiento de las condiciones de vida poblacional. Ademas, insiste en que sus ejercicios son "anuales" y "defensivos" con la intencion de atacar a nuestro pais, luego de hacer que nos acostumbremos a ellos y nos relajemos considerandolos como normales.
					
					  Partiendo de su estrategia de dar enfoque a Asia-Pacifico, EE.UU. continua librando los ejercicios militares conjuntos en la Peninsula Coreana a pesar de las protestas y condenas unanimes de la region periferica.
					
					  Asi quiere controlar con mas rigor a los titeres surcoreanos, impedir el mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas y utilizar a estos lacayos en cercar y disuadir a los paises vecinos.
					
					  Al mismo tiempo, trata de mantener el pretexto de aumento armamentista en la region de Asia-Pacifico al seguir agravando la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  La presente edicion de Key Resolve y Foal Eagle, que realizan los enemigos, reviste el caracter provocativo mas fuerte que nunca.
					
					  En el ano nuevo, hemos presentado propuestas magnanimas y flexibles para eliminar el peligro de guerra, relajar la tension y preparar un ambiente pacifico en la Peninsula Coreana y realizado todos los esfuerzos sinceros por ponerlas en practica.
					
					  Anunciamos que tenemos la voluntad de responder con el cese provisional de la prueba nuclear, que preocupa a EE.UU., si este suspende temporalmente los ejercicios militares conjuntos en el Sur de Corea y sus alrededores, y expusimos la posicion de que estamos listos para conversar en cualquier tiempo con ese pais.
					
					  Sin embargo, ya en los umbrales de este ano, el presidente estadounidense declaro personalmente la "sancion adicional" contra la RPDC prometiendo publicamente "derrumbar" el regimen socialista que el pueblo coreano aprecia mas que su vida.
					
					  Posteriormente, EE.UU. puso en marcha los ejercicios de guerra anti-RPDC junto con los titeres surcoreanos desafiando frontalmente a las iniciativas y esfuerzos sinceros de nuestro pais.
					
					  Asi se conocieron claramente la naturaleza de EE.UU. como culpable principal de la agravacion de tension y la perturbacion de paz y el caracter enganoso e hipocrita de su alegato por el dialogo.
					
					  Si se toma en cuenta la critica situacion y atmosfera causadas por la fiebre conflictiva anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos, es especialmente alto el grado de peligro de provocacion incidental.
					
					  Puesto que se torna extremadamente brutal la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU., se hara mas fuerte la justa reaccion de nuestro ejercito y pueblo para llevarla al fracaso.
					
					  Como se ha declarado ya, nuestro ejercito y pueblo estan preparados a cualquier forma de guerra que desee y escoja EE.UU. y decididos a responder con la justa guerra de reunificacion de la patria a cualquier minima provocacion de los enemigos.
					
					  Si estalla por fin la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos no podran eludir jamas las consecuencias y responsabilidades de ello.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente argelino
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente argelino 
						
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 2 un mensaje al presidente de la Republica Argelina Democratica y Popular, Abdelaziz Bouteflika, para felicitar su cumpleanos.
					El remitente expreso la esperanza de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se desarrollaran mas en adelante y deseo de todo corazon al mandatario argelino buena salud y felicitad y mayores exitos en su trabajo por la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Publicado llamamiento conjunto Norte-Sur con motivo del Primero de Marzo
articles.content:
Publicado llamamiento conjunto Norte-Sur con motivo del Primero de Marzo
						
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Consejo por la Reunificacion de la Nacion de Tangun del Norte de Corea y el Comite Preparatorio Nacional de las Actividades Conjuntas por Primero de Marzo y el Consejo por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Nacion de Tangun, del Sur de Corea publicaron ayer un llamamiento conjunto dedicado al 96o aniversario del Levantamiento Popular del Primero de Marzo.
					Esta rebelion popular escribio una pagina de la historia de lucha nacional antijaponesa por la liberacion de Corea.
					
					Ese evento historico demostro el fuerte espiritu independiente, el indoblegable temperamento y el ferviente patriotismo del pueblo coreano que resiste a riesgo de la vida la dominacion y la represion de las fuerzas foraneas y sacudio de raices la dominacion colonial del imperialismo japones, recuerda el documento y continua:
					
					Hay que acabar con la injerencia de las fuerzas foraneas con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nacion y desarrollar sin cesar la lucha por defender la paz y expulsar a las fuerzas extranjeras.
					
					Toda la nacion debe rechazar tajantemente los ejercicios militares conjuntos con las fuerzas foraneas, impedir el renacimiento del militarismo japones y librar una campana pannacional para obligar a este pais isleno pedir disculpas e indemnizar sus horribles crimenes cometidos en el pasado.
					
					Debemos lograr la gran unidad nacional bajo el ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y solucionar sin complicaciones el problema de reunificacion de la patria conforme al interes comun de la nacion.
					
					Todos los coreanos deben defender las Declaraciones Conjuntas del 4 de Julio y del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y emprender una energica campana pannacional por fomentar la implementacion de ellas.
					
					Uniendo las fuerzas y voluntades, todos los coreanos del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben lograr gran cambio en las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y abrir la senda de reunificacion independiente.

articles.title: Delegado coreano demanda reforma del Consejo de Seguridad de ONU
articles.content:
Delegado coreano demanda reforma del Consejo de Seguridad de ONU
						
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ACNC) -- El delegado coreano pronuncio un discurso en el seminario abierto del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU sobre el mantenimiento de la paz y seguridad internacionales, efectuado el 23 de febrero. 
					La ONU atribuyo al Consejo de Seguridad como primera responsabilidad mantener la paz y seguridad internacionales, pero, hoy dia, sus actividades distan mucho de los principios estipulados por la Carta de la ONU, dijo y continuo:
					
					En la actualidad algun pais miembro permanente del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU trata de actuar como "gendarme" mundial mediante la alianza militar o la bilateral y a veces, abusando del Consejo de Seguridad. 
					
					El despotismo y las arbitrariedades en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU por parte de un pais miembro permanente del Consejo de Seguridad se expresan mas intensamente en la situacion creada en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					El debate del problema coreano en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU no se enfoca a la preservacion de la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana sino a la realizacion de la meta estrategica de Estados Unidos de exterminar la soberania y el derecho a la vida de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					La administracion estadounidense persigue la politica de exterminar la ideologia, el regimen y la soberania de la RPDC mediante la  movilizacion de todos los espacios como las "armas nucleares", los "derechos humanos", el "ataque cibernetico" y la "libertad de  expresion", etc. 
					
					Hay que frenar la conversion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU en el aparato de despotismo y arbitrariedades. 
					
					Asi que se presenta la necesidad de reformar cuanto antes el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU. 
					
					EE.UU. debe retirar de inmediato la unilateral politica hostil a los paises miembros de la ONU y los paises soberanos y parar el abuso del Consejo de Seguridad en la realizacion de sus fines injustos. 
					
					Si el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU quiere mostrar la sincera posicion sobre la paz y la seguridad del mundo, debe cuestionar merecidamente los ejercicios de guerra de EE.UU. tendentes a rechazar y derrocar los Estados soberanos, y las torturas horribles de la Agencia Central de Inteligencia de EE.UU.
